kokomans_2 wrote:

> hey everybody! I'm currently working on a project for ancient history
> class and I need to find information on the daily life of a samurai.
> I'm basically done the project except for this part, also I'd like to
> know the training that one would go through to become a samurai. If
> anybody can help by telling me anyhting they know, or by posting a
> link I'll be forever grateful, thanks ahead of time.
>

Well, for starters, I gotta tell ya...

If it's an *ancient* history class you shouldn't be doing anything on samurai,
who didn't really come into their own until the 11th century or so.

Tony
